title: Which German aircraft were better than Allied aircraft during WW2? - Quora
tags: Military History and Wars of Germany

response.answer_text: The war lasted 6 years and there were differant points were some of the Axes Aircraft were better than allide Aircraft. there were times when the JU 88, the Me 109 and the FW190 were superior to the allied. This went back and forth as both sides made improvements to there planes. Of coarse the Me 262 was superior in speed but lacked manuverabuilaty and range. Right to the end of the Conflict both sides had compatable aircraft!
